bill.title: Relating to wages.
bill.description: Makes contractor liable for unpaid wages, including other benefit payment or contributions of employee of subcontractor at any tier. Makes contractor liable for unpaid wages, including other benefit payment or contributions of employee of subcontractor at any tier. Permits third party owed payment or contribution made as part of employee compensation to bring action against contractor on behalf of employee for unpaid wages. Requires subcontractor to provide certain payroll records and other information to contractor upon request. Permits contractor to withhold payment to subcontractor for failure to comply with request for records.

history.action: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
